tool_description: Unoffical FPL (Fantasy Premier League) Wrapper for FPL API! Dive  into league analytics, player stats, and live game data!
name: Fantasy Premier League - FPL API
title: Fantasy Premier League - FPL API

api_list.name: ClassicLeagueStandings
api_list.description: This action allows you to return information on a Classic League in Fantasy Premier League with a league ID

required_parameters.name: league_id
required_parameters.description: Provide the League ID for the league you want to retireve information on

api_list.name: PlayersDetailedData
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a players detailed information divided into 3 sections; fixtures, current league history and previous years history

required_parameters.name: element_id
required_parameters.description: Provide the Element ID (player number) for the player who you wish to gather information on

api_list.name: ManagerUsersHistory
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a managers (users) data from previous game weeks (current), previous seasons (past), and chips that already used during this season. You need to provide the Manager ID.

required_parameters.name: manager_id
required_parameters.description: Provide the Manager ID for the manager of who you wish to gather history

api_list.name: ManagerUsersBasicInformation
api_list.description: This returns the managers basic information such as leagues joined, favorite team, first and last names

required_parameters.name: manager_id
required_parameters.description: Provide the Manager ID for the manager of who you wish to gather basic information

api_list.name: GeneralInformation
api_list.description: This endpoint returns general information about the Fantasy Premier League
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league-fpl-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/bootstrap-static/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league-fpl-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: CurrentYearFixtures
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a JSON array which contains every fixture of the season.

api_list.name: GameWeekLiveData
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of players information in that specific Gameweek.

required_parameters.name: event_id
required_parameters.description: Provide the game week number as the event ID to get that weeks live data

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league-fpl-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/event/1/live/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league-fpl-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league-fpl-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/event/{event_id}/live/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league-fpl-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
